snippet: Refugees who had been gathering on the Syrian side of the border with Turkey broke through the crossing, passing babies and their belongings through a barbed-wire fence.
abstract: Thousands of Syrian refugees fleeing conflict between Kurdish fighters and Islamic State militants cut through border fence and enter Turkey.
lead_paragraph: Refugees who had been gathering on the Syrian side of the border with Turkey broke through the crossing, passing babies and their belongings through a barbed-wire fence.

headline.main: Thousands Flee Syria as Kurds Gain on ISIS
headline.print_headline: Thousands Flee Syria as Kurds Gain on ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
